message.name: ERR_PGAPAYMENTCONFIG_XRV_ACTIVE_RECORD_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: An 'Active' configuration already exists effective from %1d.

message.name: ERR_PGAPAYMENTCONFIG_XRV_CANNOT_UPDATE_CANCELLED_PGASSOCIATEPAYMENTCONFIG
message.locale: This provider group associate payment configuration has been deleted, it cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_PGAPAYMENTCONFIG_XRV_CANNOT_CREATE_ON_THIS_DATE_AS_PAYMENTS_ALREADY_MADE_TO_PROVIDER
message.locale: A payment has been made to the provider for %1d, the payment configuration cannot be created effective from or before this date.

message.name: ERR_PGAPAYMENTCONFIG_XRV_CANNOT_UPDATE_AS_PAYMENTS_ALREADY_MADE_TO_PROVIDER
message.locale: A payment has been made to the provider for %1d, the payment configuration cannot be updated.

message.name: ERR_PGAPAYMENTCONFIG_XRV_CANNOT_DELETE_AS_PAYMENTS_ALREADY_MADE_TO_PROVIDER
message.locale: A payment has been made to the provider for %1d, the payment configuration cannot be deleted.
